```{r , eval=TRUE, include=FALSE}
if (!file.exists("./screenshots/thumbnail_template-HE1.png")) {
webshot2::webshot(
  url = "https://images.patolojiatlasi.com/template/HE1.html",
  file = "./screenshots/thumbnail_template-HE1.png"
)
}
```



```{r , eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE, error=TRUE}
if (!file.exists("./qrcodes/template-HE1_qrcode.svg")) {

  qrcode_svg <- qrcode::qr_code("https://images.patolojiatlasi.com/template/HE1.html")

  qrcode::generate_svg(qrcode = qrcode_svg,
                       filename = "./qrcodes/template-HE1_qrcode.svg",
                       show = FALSE)
}
```
